vote.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 27, “Minimum Property Standards,” by amending Section 27-30; (1) adding Chapter 42B, “Short-Term Rentals,” to the Dallas City Code; (2) providing (description of amendment); (3) providing a penalty not to exceed $500.00; (4) providing a saving clause; (5) providing a severability clause; and (6) providing an effective date - Estimated Revenue: General Fund $48,001.00 or $1,562,631.00 annually (see Fiscal Information)
